member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.SqlServer.SqlCommandExecutionRetried
member.summary: Count metric which records execution of a SQL command resulting in a transient error and being retried.

member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.SqlServer.SqlServerAccessManagerTemporalPersister`4
member.summary: An implementation of and see which persists access manager events to and allows reading of objects from a Microsoft SQL Server database.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the IAccessManagerTemporalEventPersister and IAccessManagerTemporalPersistentReader implementations.
The type of groups in the IAccessManagerTemporalEventPersister and IAccessManagerTemporalPersistentReader implementations.
The type of components in the IAccessManagerEventProcessor and IAccessManagerTemporalPersistentReader implementations.
The type of levels of access in the IAccessManagerTemporalEventPersister and IAccessManagerTemporalPersistentReader implementations.
member.remarks: Note that IAccessManagerEventProcessor methods implemented in this class should not be called from concurrent threads. The class is designed to operate behind a class which manages mutual exclusion such as the AccessManagerTemporalEventPersisterBuffer or ConcurrentAccessManagerEventValidator classes.

member.name: F:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.SqlServer.SqlServerAccessManagerTemporalPersister`4.columnSizeLimit
member.summary: The maximum size of text columns in the database (restricted by limits on the sizes of index keys... see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/sql-server/maximum-capacity-specifications-for-sql-server?view=sql-server-ver16).

member.name: F:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.SqlServer.SqlServerAccessManagerTemporalPersister`4.transactionSql126DateStyle
member.summary: DateTime format string which matches the Transact-SQL 126 date and time style.

member.summary: The string to use to connect to the SQL Server database.

member.name: F:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.SqlServer.SqlServerAccessManagerTemporalPersister`4.retryCount
member.summary: The number of times an operation against the SQL Server database should be retried in the case of execution failure.

member.name: F:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.SqlServer.SqlServerAccessManagerTemporalPersister`4.retryInterval
member.summary: The time in seconds between operation retries.

member.returns: A collection of all users in the database valid at the specified time.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.SqlServer.SqlServerAccessManagerTemporalPersister`4.GetEntityTypes(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns all entity types in the database valid at the specified state time.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.SqlServer.SqlServerAccessManagerTemporalPersister`4.GetEntities(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns all entities in the database valid at the specified state time.
member.param: The time equal to or sequentially after (in terms of event sequence) the state of the access manager to load.
member.returns: A collection of all entities in the database valid at the specified state time. Each tuple contains: the type of the entity, and the entity itself.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.SqlServer.SqlServerAccessManagerTemporalPersister`4.GetUserToEntityMappings(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns all user to entity mappings in the database valid at the specified state time.
member.param: The time equal to or sequentially after (in terms of event sequence) the state of the access manager to load.
member.returns: A collection of all user to entity mappings in the database valid at the specified state time. Each tuple contains: the user, the type of the entity, and the entity.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.SqlServer.SqlServerAccessManagerTemporalPersister`4.GetGroupToEntityMappings(System.DateTime)
